alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 25 at 3:32PM EDT until March 26 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maine, Northern Franklin and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos, Northern Grafton, and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 4 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to be greatest at higher elevations, as well as northwest slopes of the White Mountains and Boundary Range.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Coos
